de.fzi.replica.comm
Interface Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionImpl.ConnectionContextImpl.ConnectionActivityImpl
Enclosing interface:
Connection.ConnectionContext
public static interface Connection.ConnectionContext.ConnectionActivity

A connection activity is a list of ConnectionActivityStates. They represent a sequence of connection states in a in a communication procedure and provide a way of knowing about the current position in the procedure and the ability to set a state change listener.

Version:
0.2, 21.07.2011
Author:
Jan Novacek novacek@fzi.de
